title.text: Learning Syntactic Structures with XML Herv6 D6jean Seminar fiir Sprachwissenschaft Universit~it Tiibingen dej eanOsf s. nph±l, un±-tuebingen, de

introductionContent.text: We present the result of a symbolic machine learning system for the CoNLL-2000 shared task.
This system, ALLiS, is based on theory refinement.
In this paper we want to show that XML format not only offers a good framework to annotate texts, but also provides a good formalism and tools in order to learn (syntactic) structures.
